singleTweet.author: @BBCSport
singleTweet.text:
ENGLAND HAVE DONE IT!
An eight wicket win over Australia puts them into Sunday's final against New Zealand.

Arsenal have condemned "unacceptable" racial abuse Jordi Osei-Tutu suffered during a pre-season friendly for loan club VfL Bochum.
The 20-year-old left the pitch in tears saying an opposition player had abused him.
